text: Robert Henry Brom (September 18, 1938 - May 9, 2022) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was bishop of the Diocese of Duluth from 1983 to 1989. He later was bishop of the Diocese of San Diego in Southern California from 1990 to 2013. Brom was born in Arcadia, Wisconsin. Brom died on May 9, 2022 in San Diego, California at the age of 83.Robert Brom Dies at 83; San Diego Catholic Bishop Oversaw Diocese Bankruptcy ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Duluth, Minnesota Category:People from San Diego Category:People from Wisconsin
title: Robert Brom
